Application.description: This class represents the Live application.

methods.name: get_bugfix_version()
methods.description: Returns an integer representing the bugfix version of Live.

methods.name: get_document()
methods.description: Returns the current Live Set.

methods.name: get_major_version()
methods.description: Returns an integer representing the major version of Live.

methods.name: get_minor_version()
methods.description: Returns an integer representing the minor version of Live.

methods.name: has_option()
methods.description: Returns True if the given entry exists in Options.txt, False otherwise.

methods.name: press_current_dialog_button()
methods.description: Press a button, by index, on the current message box.

properties.name: browser
properties.description: Returns an interface to the browser.

properties.name: canonical_parent
properties.description: Returns the canonical parent of the application.

properties.name: control_surfaces
properties.description: Const access to a list of the control surfaces selected in preferences, in the same order.The list contains None if no control surface is active at that index.

properties.name: current_dialog_button_count
properties.description: Number of buttons on the current dialog.

properties.name: current_dialog_message
properties.description: Text of the last dialog that appeared; Empty if all dialogs just disappeared.

properties.name: open_dialog_count
properties.description: The number of open dialogs in Live. 0 if not dialog is open.

properties.name: unavailable_features
properties.description: List of features that are unavailable due to limitations of the current Live edition.

properties.name: view
properties.description: Returns the applications view component.

UnavailableFeatureVector.description: A container for returning unavailable features.

built_ins.name: combine_apcs()
built_ins.description: Returns true if multiple APCs should be combined.

built_ins.name: encrypt_challenge()
built_ins.description: Returns an encrypted challenge based on the TEA algortithm

built_ins.name: encrypt_challenge2()
built_ins.description: Returns the UMAC hash for the given challenge.

built_ins.name: get_random_int()
built_ins.description: Returns a random integer from the given range.

FloatVector.description: A simple container for returning floats from Live.

IntVector.description: A simple container for returning integers from Live.

ObjectVector.description: A simple read only container for returning python objects.

StringVector.description: A simple container for returning strings from Live.

Timer.description: A timer that will trigger a callback after a certain inverval. The timer can be repeated and will trigger the callback every interval. Errors in the callback will stop the timer.

Vector.description: A simple read only container for returning objects from Live.

Browser.description: This class represents the live browser data base.

methods.name: load_item()
methods.description: Loads the provided browser item.

methods.name: preview_item()
methods.description: Previews the provided browser item.

methods.name: relation_to_hotswap_target()
methods.description: Returns the relation between the given browser item and the current hotswap target

methods.name: stop_preview()
methods.description: Stop the current preview.

properties.name: audio_effects
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Audio Effects content.

properties.name: clips
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Clips content.

properties.name: colors
properties.description: Returns a list of browser items containing the configured colors.

properties.name: current_project
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Current Project content.

properties.name: drums
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Drums content.

properties.name: filter_type
properties.description: Bang triggered when the hotswap target has changed.

properties.name: hotswap_target
properties.description: Bang triggered when the hotswap target has changed.

properties.name: instruments
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Instruments content.

properties.name: legacy_libraries
properties.description: Returns a list of browser items containing the installed legacy libraries. The list is always empty as legacy library handling has been removed.

properties.name: max_for_live
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Max For Live content.

properties.name: midi_effects
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Midi Effects content.

properties.name: packs
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Packs content.

properties.name: plugins
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Plugins content.

properties.name: samples
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Samples content.

properties.name: sounds
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the Sounds content.

properties.name: user_folders
properties.description: Returns a list of browser items containing all the user folders.

properties.name: user_library
properties.description: Returns a browser item with access to all the User Library content.

BrowserItem.description: This class represents an item of the browser hierarchy.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Const access to the descendants of this browser item.

properties.name: is_device
properties.description: Indicates if the browser item represents a device.

properties.name: is_folder
properties.description: Indicates if the browser item represents folder.

properties.name: is_loadable
properties.description: True if item can be loaded via the Browser’s ‘load_item’ method.

properties.name: is_selected
properties.description: True if the item is ancestor of or the actual selection.

properties.name: iter_children
properties.description: Const iterable access to the descendants of this browser item.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Const access to the canonical display name of this browser item.

properties.name: source
properties.description: Specifies where does item come from — i.e. Live pack, user library…

properties.name: uri
properties.description: The uri describes a unique identifier for a browser item.

BrowserItemIterator.description: This class iterates over children of another BrowserItem.

methods.name: next()
methods.description: Retrieve next item

BrowserItemVector.description: A container for returning browser items from Live.

Chain.description: This class represents a group device chain in Live.

methods.name: delete_device()
methods.description: Remove a device identified by its index from the chain. Throws runtime error if bad index.

properties.name: canonical_parent
properties.description: Get the canonical parent of the chain.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Access the color index of the Chain.

properties.name: color_index
properties.description: Access the color index of the Chain.

properties.name: devices
properties.description: Return const access to all available Devices that are present in the chains

properties.name: has_audio_input
properties.description: return True, if this Chain can be feed with an Audio signal. This istrue for all Audio Chains.

properties.name: has_audio_output
properties.description: return True, if this Chain sends out an Audio signal. This istrue for all Audio Chains, and MIDI chains with an Instrument.

properties.name: has_midi_input
properties.description: return True, if this Chain can be feed with an Audio signal. This istrue for all MIDI Chains.

properties.name: has_midi_output
properties.description: return True, if this Chain sends out MIDI events. This istrue for all MIDI Chains with no Instruments.

properties.name: is_auto_colored
properties.description: Get/set access to the auto color flag of the Chain.If True, the Chain will always have the same color as the containingTrack or Chain.

properties.name: mixer_device
properties.description: Return access to the mixer device that holds the chain’s mixer parameters:the Volume, Pan, and Sendamounts.

properties.name: mute
properties.description: Mute/unmute the chain.

properties.name: muted_via_solo
properties.description: Return const access to whether this chain is muted due to some other chainbeing soloed.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Read/write access to the name of the Chain, as visible in the track header.

properties.name: solo
properties.description: Get/Set the solo status of the chain. Note that this will not disable thesolo state of any other Chain in the same rack. If you want exclusive solo, you have to disable the solo state of the other Cha

Clip.description: This class represents a Clip in Live. It can be either an AudioClip or a MIDI Clip, in an Arrangement or the Session, dependingon the Track (Slot) it lives in.

methods.name: add_new_notes()
methods.description: Expects a Python iterable holding a number of Live.Clip.MidiNoteSpecification objects. The objects will be used to construct new notes in the clip.

methods.name: apply_note_modifications()
methods.description: Expects a list of notes as returned from get_notes_extended. The content of the list will be used to modify existing notes in the clip, based on matching note IDs. This function should be used when mo

methods.name: automation_envelope()
methods.description: Return the envelope for the given parameter.Returns None if the envelope doesn’t exist.Returns None for Arrangement clips.Returns None for parameters from a different track.

methods.name: beat_to_sample_time()
methods.description: Available for AudioClips only. Converts the given beat time to sample time. Raises an error if the sample is not warped.

methods.name: clear_all_envelopes()
methods.description: Clears all envelopes for this clip.

methods.name: clear_envelope()
methods.description: Clears the envelope of this clips given parameter.

methods.name: create_automation_envelope()
methods.description: Creates an envelope for a given parameter and returns it.This should only be used if the envelope doesn’t exist.Raises an error if the envelope can’t be created.

methods.name: crop()
methods.description: Crops the clip. The region that is cropped depends on whether the clip is looped or not. If looped, the region outside of the loop is removed. If not looped, the region outside the start and end marke

methods.name: deselect_all_notes()
methods.description: De-selects all notes present in the clip.

methods.name: duplicate_loop()
methods.description: Make the loop two times longer and duplicates notes and envelopes. Duplicates the clip start/end range if the clip is not looped.

methods.name: duplicate_region()
methods.description: Duplicate the notes in the specified region to the destination_time. Only notes of the specified pitch are duplicated or all if pitch is -1. If the transposition_amount is not 0, the notes in the regi

methods.name: fire()
methods.description: (Re)Start playing this Clip.

methods.name: get_notes()
methods.description: Returns a tuple of tuples where each inner tuple represents a note starting in the given pitch- and time range. The inner tuple contains pitch, time, duration, velocity, and mute state.

methods.name: get_notes_by_id()
methods.description: Return a list of MIDI notes matching the given note IDs.

methods.name: get_notes_extended()
methods.description: Returns a list of MIDI notes from the given pitch and time range. Each note is represented by a Live.Clip.MidiNote object. The returned list can be modified freely, but modifications will not be refle

methods.name: get_selected_notes()
methods.description: Returns a tuple of tuples where each inner tuple represents a selected note. The inner tuple contains pitch, time, duration, velocity, and mute state.

methods.name: get_selected_notes_extended()
methods.description: Returns a list of all MIDI notes from the clip that are currently selected. Each note is represented by a Live.Clip.MidiNote object. The returned list can be modified freely, but modifications will no

methods.name: move_playing_pos()
methods.description: Jump forward or backward by the specified relative amount in beats. Will do nothing, if the Clip is not playing.

methods.name: quantize()
methods.description: Quantize all notes in a clip or align warp markers.

methods.name: quantize_pitch()
methods.description: Quantize all the notes of a given pitch.  Raises an error on audio clips.

methods.name: remove_notes()
methods.description: Delete all notes starting in the given pitch- and time range.

methods.name: remove_notes_by_id()
methods.description: Delete all notes matching the given note IDs. This function should NOT be used to implement modification of existing notes (i.e. in combination with add_new_notes), as that leads to loss of per-note e

methods.name: remove_notes_extended()
methods.description: Delete all notes starting in the given pitch and time range. This function should NOT be used to implement modification of existing notes (i.e. in combination with add_new_notes), as that leads to los

methods.name: replace_selected_notes()
methods.description: Called with a tuple of tuples where each inner tuple represents a note in the same format as returned by get_selected_notes. The notes described that way will then be used to replace the old selection

methods.name: sample_to_beat_time()
methods.description: Available for AudioClips only. Converts the given sample time to beat time. Raises an error if the sample is not warped.

methods.name: scrub()
methods.description: Scrubs inside a clip. scrub_position defines the position in beats that the scrub will start from. The scrub will continue until stop_scrub is called. Global quantization applies to the scrub’s positi

methods.name: seconds_to_sample_time()
methods.description: Available for AudioClips only. Converts the given seconds to sample time. Raises an error if the sample is warped.

methods.name: select_all_notes()
methods.description: Selects all notes present in the clip.

methods.name: set_fire_button_state()
methods.description: Set the clip’s fire button state directly. Supports all launch modes.

methods.name: set_notes()
methods.description: Called with a tuple of tuples where each inner tuple represents a note in the same format as returned by get_notes. The notes described that way will then be added to the clip.

methods.name: stop()
methods.description: Stop playing this Clip.

methods.name: stop_scrub()
methods.description: Stops the current scrub.

properties.name: available_warp_modes
properties.description: Available for AudioClips only.Get/Set the available warp modes, that can be used.

properties.name: canonical_parent
properties.description: Get the canonical parent of the Clip.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Get/set access to the color of the Clip (RGB).

properties.name: color_index
properties.description: Get/set access to the color index of the Clip.

properties.name: end_marker
properties.description: Get/Set the Clips end marker pos in beats/seconds (unit depends on warping).

properties.name: end_time
properties.description: Get the clip’s end time.

properties.name: file_path
properties.description: Get the path of the file represented by the Audio Clip.

properties.name: gain
properties.description: Available for AudioClips only.Read/write access to the gain setting of theAudio Clip

properties.name: gain_display_string
properties.description: Return a string with the gain as dB value

properties.name: groove
properties.description: Get the groove associated with this clip.

properties.name: has_envelopes
properties.description: Will notify if the clip gets his first envelope or the last envelope is removed.

properties.name: has_groove
properties.description: Returns true if a groove is associated with this clip.

properties.name: is_arrangement_clip
properties.description: return true if this Clip is an Arrangement Clip.A Clip can be either a Session or Arrangement Clip.

properties.name: is_audio_clip
properties.description: Return true if this Clip is an Audio Clip.A Clip can be either an Audioclip or a MIDI Clip.

properties.name: is_midi_clip
properties.description: return true if this Clip is a MIDI Clip.A Clip can be either an Audioclip or a MIDI Clip.

properties.name: is_overdubbing
properties.description: returns true if the Clip is recording overdubs

properties.name: is_playing
properties.description: Get/Set if this Clip is currently playing. If the Clips trigger modeis set to a quantization value, the Clip will not start playing immediately.If you need to know wether the Clip was triggered, use t

properties.name: is_recording
properties.description: returns true if the Clip was triggered to record or is recording.

properties.name: is_triggered
properties.description: returns true if the Clip was triggered or is playing.

properties.name: launch_mode
properties.description: Get/Set access to the launch mode setting of the Clip.

properties.name: launch_quantization
properties.description: Get/Set access to the launch quantization setting of the Clip.

properties.name: legato
properties.description: Get/Set access to the legato setting of the Clip

properties.name: length
properties.description: Get to the Clips length in beats/seconds (unit depends on warping).

properties.name: loop_end
properties.description: Get/Set the loop end pos of this Clip in beats/seconds (unit depends on warping).

properties.name: loop_start
properties.description: Get/Set the Clips loopstart pos in beats/seconds (unit depends on warping).

properties.name: looping
properties.description: Get/Set the Clips ‘loop is enabled’ flag.Only Warped Audio Clips or MIDI Clip can be looped.

properties.name: muted
properties.description: Read/write access to the mute state of the Clip.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Read/write access to the name of the Clip.

properties.name: pitch_coarse
properties.description: Available for AudioClips only.Read/write access to the pitch (in halftones) setting of theAudio Clip, ranging from -48 to 48

properties.name: pitch_fine
properties.description: Available for AudioClips only.Read/write access to the pitch fine setting of theAudio Clip, ranging from -500 to 500

properties.name: playing_position
properties.description: Constant access to the current playing position of the clip.The returned value is the position in beats for midi and warped audio clips, or in seconds for unwarped audio clips. Stopped clips will retu

properties.name: position
properties.description: Get/Set the loop position of this Clip in beats/seconds (unit depends on warping).

properties.name: ram_mode
properties.description: Available for AudioClips only.Read/write access to the Ram mode setting of the Audio Clip

properties.name: sample_length
properties.description: Available for AudioClips only.Get the sample length in sample time or -1 if there is no sample available.

properties.name: signature_denominator
properties.description: Get/Set access to the global signature denominator of the Clip.

properties.name: signature_numerator
properties.description: Get/Set access to the global signature numerator of the Clip.

properties.name: start_marker
properties.description: Get/Set the Clips start marker pos in beats/seconds (unit depends on warping).

properties.name: start_time
properties.description: Get the clip’s start time offset. For Session View clips, this is the time the clip was started. For Arrangement View clips, this is the offset within the arrangement.

properties.name: velocity_amount
properties.description: Get/Set access to the velocity to volume amount of the Clip.

properties.name: view
properties.description: Get the view of the Clip.

properties.name: warp_markers
properties.description: Available for AudioClips only.Get the warp markers for this audio clip.

properties.name: warp_mode
properties.description: Available for AudioClips only.Get/Set the warp mode for this audio clip.

properties.name: warping
properties.description: Available for AudioClips only.Get/Set if this Clip is timestreched.

properties.name: will_record_on_start
properties.description: returns true if the Clip will record on being started.

MidiNote.description: An object representing a MIDI Note

properties.name: note_id
properties.description: A numerical ID that’s unique within the originating clip of the note. Not to beused directly, but important for other API calls, namely apply_note_modifications.

MidiNoteSpecification.description: An object specifying the data for creating a MIDI note. To be used with the add_new_notes function.

MidiNoteVector.description: A container for holding MIDI notes from Live.

WarpMarker.description: This class represents a WarpMarker type.

properties.name: beat_time
properties.description: A WarpMarker’s beat time.

properties.name: sample_time
properties.description: A WarpMarker’s sample time.

WarpMarkerVector.description: A container for returning warp markers from Live.

ClipSlot.description: This class represents an entry in Lives Session view matrix.

methods.name: create_clip()
methods.description: Creates an empty clip with the given length in the slot. Throws an error when called on non-empty slots or slots in non-MIDI tracks.

methods.name: delete_clip()
methods.description: Removes the clip contained in the slot. Raises an exception if the slot was empty.

methods.name: duplicate_clip_to()
methods.description: Duplicates the slot’s clip to the passed in target slot. Overrides the target’s clip if it’s not empty. Raises an exception if the (source) slot itself is empty, or if source and target have different

methods.name: fire()
methods.description: Fire a Clip if this Clipslot owns one, else trigger the stop button, if we have one.

methods.name: set_fire_button_state()
methods.description: Set the clipslot’s fire button state directly. Supports all launch modes.

methods.name: stop()
methods.description: Stop playing the contained Clip, if there is a Clip and its currently playing.

properties.name: canonical_parent
properties.description: Get the canonical parent of the ClipSlot.

properties.name: clip
properties.description: Returns the Clip which this clipslots currently owns. Might be None.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Returns the canonical color for the clip slot or None if it does not exist.

properties.name: color_index
properties.description: Returns the canonical color index for the clip slot or None if it does not exist.

properties.name: controls_other_clips
properties.description: Returns true if firing this slot will fire clips in other slots.Can only be true for slots in group tracks.

properties.name: has_clip
properties.description: Returns true if this Clipslot owns a Clip.

properties.name: has_stop_button
properties.description: Get/Set if this Clip has a stop button, which will, if fired, stop anyother Clip that is currently playing the Track we do belong to.

properties.name: is_group_slot
properties.description: Returns whether this clip slot is a group track slot (group slot).

properties.name: is_playing
properties.description: Returns whether the clip associated with the slot is playing.

properties.name: is_recording
properties.description: Returns whether the clip associated with the slot is recording.

properties.name: is_triggered
properties.description: Const access to the triggering state of the clip slot.

properties.name: playing_status
properties.description: Const access to the playing state of the clip slot.Can be either stopped, playing, or recording.

properties.name: will_record_on_start
properties.description: returns true if the clip slot will record on being fired.

built_ins.name: audio_to_midi_clip()
built_ins.description: Creates a MIDI clip in a new MIDI track with the notes extracted from the given audio_clip. The `audio_to_midi_type` decides which algorithm is used in the process. Raises error when called with an in

built_ins.name: create_drum_rack_from_audio_clip()
built_ins.description: Creates a new track with a drum rack with a simpler on the first pad with the specified audio clip.

built_ins.name: create_midi_track_from_drum_pad()
built_ins.description: Creates a new Midi track containing the specified Drum Pad’s device chain.

built_ins.name: create_midi_track_with_simpler()
built_ins.description: Creates a new Midi track with a simpler including the specified audio clip.

built_ins.name: is_convertible_to_midi()
built_ins.description: Returns whether `audio_clip` can be converted to MIDI. Raises error when called with a MIDI clip

built_ins.name: move_devices_on_track_to_new_drum_rack_pad()
built_ins.description: Moves the entire device chain of the track according to the track index onto the C1 (note 36) drum pad of a new drum rack in a new track.If the track associated with the track index does not contain a

built_ins.name: sliced_simpler_to_drum_rack()
built_ins.description: Converts the Simpler into a Drum Rack, assigning each slice to a drum pad. Calling it on a non-sliced simpler raises an error.

Device.description: This class represents a MIDI or Audio DSP-Device in Live.

properties.name: can_have_chains

properties.name: can_have_drum_pads

properties.name: canonical_parent

properties.name: class_display_name

properties.name: class_name
properties.description: Return const access to the name of the device’s class.

properties.name: is_active

properties.name: name

properties.name: parameters
properties.description: Const access to the list of available automatable parameters for this device.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Return the type of the device.

properties.name: view
properties.description: Representing the view aspects of a device.

ChainMixerDevice.description: This class represents a Chain’s Mixer Device in Live, which gives youaccess to the Volume, Panning, and Send properties of a Chain.

properties.name: sends

properties.name: volume

properties.name: is_active

RackDevice.description: This class represents a Rack device.

methods.name: add_macro()
methods.description: Increases the number of visible macro controls in the rack. Throws an exception if the maximum number of macro controls is reached.

methods.name: copy_pad()
methods.description: Copies all contents of a drum pad from a source pad into a destination pad. copy_pad(source_index, destination_index) where source_index and destination_index correspond to the note number/index of th

methods.name: delete_selected_variation()
methods.description: Deletes the currently selected macro variation.Does nothing if there is no selected variation.

methods.name: randomize_macros()
methods.description: Randomizes the values for all macro controls not excluded from randomization.

methods.name: recall_last_used_variation()
methods.description: Recalls the macro variation that was recalled most recently.Does nothing if no variation has been recalled yet.

methods.name: recall_selected_variation()
methods.description: Recalls the currently selected macro variation.Does nothing if there are no variations.

methods.name: remove_macro()
methods.description: Decreases the number of visible macro controls in the rack. Throws an exception if the minimum number of macro controls is reached.

methods.name: store_chosen_bank()
methods.description: Set the selected bank in the device for persistency.

methods.name: store_variation()
methods.description: Stores a new variation of the values of all currently mapped macros

SimplerDevice.description: This class represents a Simpler device.

methods.name: crop()
methods.description: Crop the loaded sample to the active area between start- and end marker. Calling this method on an empty simpler raises an error.

methods.name: guess_playback_length()
methods.description: Return an estimated beat time for the playback length between start- and end-marker. Calling this method on an empty simpler raises an error.

methods.name: reverse()
methods.description: Reverse the loaded sample. Calling this method on an empty simpler raises an error.

methods.name: store_chosen_bank()
methods.description: Set the selected bank in the device for persistency.

methods.name: warp_as()
methods.description: Warp the playback region between start- and end-marker as the given length. Calling this method on an empty simpler raises an error.

methods.name: warp_double()
methods.description: Doubles the tempo for region between start- and end-marker.

methods.name: warp_half()
methods.description: Halves the tempo for region between start- and end-marker.

DeviceParameter.description: This class represents a (automatable) parameter within a MIDI orAudio DSP-Device.

methods.name: begin_gesture()
methods.description: Notify the begin of a modification of the parameter, when a sequence of modifications have to be consider a consistent group — for Sexample, when recording automation.

methods.name: end_gesture()
methods.description: Notify the end of a modification of the parameter. See begin_gesture.

methods.name: re_enable_automation()
methods.description: Reenable automation for this parameter.

methods.name: str_for_value()
methods.description: Return a string representation of the given value. To be used for display purposes only.  This value can include characters like ‘db’ or ‘hz’, depending on the type of the parameter.

properties.name: automation_state
properties.description: Returns state of type AutomationState.

properties.name: canonical_parent
properties.description: Get the canonical parent of the device parameter.

properties.name: default_value
properties.description: Return the default value for this parameter.  A Default value is onlyavailable for non-quantized parameter types (see ‘is_quantized’).

properties.name: is_enabled
properties.description: Returns false if the parameter has been macro mapped or disabled by Max.

properties.name: is_quantized
properties.description: Returns True, if this value is a boolean or integer like switch.Non quantized values are continues float values.

properties.name: max
properties.description: Returns const access to the upper value of the allowed range forthis parameter

properties.name: min
properties.description: Returns const access to the lower value of the allowed range forthis parameter

properties.name: name
properties.description: Returns const access the name of this parameter, as visible in Livesautomation choosers.

properties.name: original_name
properties.description: Returns const access the original name of this parameter, unaffected ofany renamings.

properties.name: state
properties.description: Returns the state of the parameter:- enabled - the parameter’s value can be changed, - irrelevant - the parameter is enabled, but value changes will not take any effect until it gets enabled, - disabl

properties.name: value
properties.description: Get/Set the current value (as visible in the GUI) this parameter.The value must be inside the min/max properties of this device.

properties.name: value_items
properties.description: Return the list of possible values for this parameter. Raises an error if ‘is_quantized’ is False.

properties.description: Access to the Flux parameter in Texture Warp Mode.

properties.name: texture_grain_size
properties.description: Access to the Grain Size parameter in Texture Warp Mode.

properties.name: tones_grain_size
properties.description: Access to the Grain Size parameter in Tones Warp Mode.

properties.name: warp_markers
properties.description: Get the warp markers for this sample.

properties.name: warp_mode
properties.description: Access to the sample’s warp mode.

properties.name: warping
properties.description: Access to the sample’s warping property.

Scene.description: This class represents an series of ClipSlots in Lives Sessionview matrix.

methods.name: fire()
methods.description: Fire the scene directly. Will fire all clipslots that this scene owns and select the scene itself.

methods.name: fire_as_selected()
methods.description: Fire the selected scene. Will fire all clipslots that this scene owns and select the next scene if necessary.

methods.name: set_fire_button_state()
methods.description: Set the scene’s fire button state directly. Supports all launch modes.

properties.name: canonical_parent
properties.description: Get the canonical parent of the scene.

properties.name: clip_slots
properties.description: return a list of clipslots (see class AClipSlot) that this scene covers.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Get/set access to the color of the Scene (RGB).

properties.name: color_index
properties.description: Get/set access to the color index of the Scene. Can be None for no color.

properties.name: is_empty
properties.description: Returns True if all clip slots of this scene are empty.

properties.name: is_triggered
properties.description: Const access to the scene’s trigger state.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Get/Set the name of the scene. Might contain the substring BPM, whichidentifies that the scene will change the tempo when fired. To Get/Setthe temp, use the ‘tempo’ property of the scene.

properties.name: tempo
properties.description: Get/Set the tempo value of the scene.The Song will use the Scenes tempo as soon as the Scene is fired.Returns -1 if the Scene has no tempo property.

BeatTime.description: Represents a Time, splitted into Bars, Beats, SubDivision and Ticks.

CaptureMode.description: The capture mode that is used for capture and insert scene.

methods.name: jump()
methods.description: When the Song is playing, set the playing-position quantized to this Cuepoint’s time. When not playing, simply move the start playing position.

properties.name: canonical_parent
properties.description: Get the canonical parent of the cue point.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Get/Listen to the name of this CuePoint, as visible in the arranger.

properties.name: time
properties.description: Get/Listen to the CuePoint’s time in beats.

SmptTime.description: Represents a Time, split into Hours, Minutes, Seconds and Frames.The frame type must be specified when calling a function that returnsa SmptTime.

Song.description: This class represents a Live set.

methods.name: capture_and_insert_scene()
methods.description: Capture currently playing clips and insert them as a new scene after the selected scene. Raises a runtime error if creating a new scene would exceed the limitations.

methods.name: capture_midi()
methods.description: Capture recently played MIDI material from audible tracks. If no Destination is given or Destination is set to CaptureDestination.auto, the captured material is inserted into the Session or Arrangemen

methods.name: continue_playing()
methods.description: Continue playing the song from the current position

methods.name: create_audio_track()
methods.description: Create a new audio track at the optional given index and return it.If the index is -1, the new track is added at the end. It will create a default audio track if possible. If the index is invalid or t

methods.name: create_midi_track()
methods.description: Create a new midi track at the optional given index and return it.If the index is -1,  the new track is added at the end.It will create a default midi track if possible. If the index is invalid or the

methods.name: create_return_track()
methods.description: Create a new return track at the end and return it. If the new track would exceed  the limitations, a limitation error is raised.  If the maximum number of return tracks is exceeded, a RuntimeError is

methods.name: create_scene()
methods.description: Create a new scene at the given index. If the index is -1, the new scene is added at the end. If the index is invalid or the new scene would exceed the limitations, a limitation error is raised.

methods.name: delete_return_track()
methods.description: Delete the return track with the given index. If no track with this index exists, an exception will be raised.

methods.name: delete_scene()
methods.description: Delete the scene with the given index. If no scene with this index exists, an exception will be raised.

methods.name: delete_track()
methods.description: Delete the track with the given index. If no track with this index exists, an exception will be raised.

methods.name: duplicate_scene()
methods.description: Duplicates a scene and selects the new one. Raises a limitation error if creating a new scene would exceed the limitations.

methods.name: duplicate_track()
methods.description: Duplicates a track and selects the new one. If the track is inside a folded group track, the group track is unfolded. Raises a limitation error if creating a new track would exceed the limitations.

methods.name: find_device_position()
methods.description: Returns the closest possible position to the given target, where the device can be inserted. If inserting is not possible at all (i.e. if the device type is wrong), -1 is returned.

methods.name: force_link_beat_time()
methods.description: Force the Link timeline to jump to Lives current beat time. Danger: This can cause beat time discontinuities in other connected apps.

methods.name: get_beats_loop_length()
methods.description: Get const access to the songs loop length, using a BeatTime class with the current global set signature.

methods.name: get_beats_loop_start()
methods.description: Get const access to the songs loop start, using a BeatTime class with the current global set signature.

methods.name: get_current_beats_song_time()
methods.description: Get const access to the songs current playing position, using a BeatTime class with the current global set signature.

methods.name: get_current_smpte_song_time()
methods.description: Get const access to the songs current playing position, by specifying the SMPTE format in which you would like to receive the time.

methods.name: get_data()
methods.description: Get data for the given key, that was previously stored using set_data.

methods.name: is_cue_point_selected()
methods.description: Return true if the global playing pos is currently on a cue point.

methods.name: jump_by()
methods.description: Set a new playing pos, relative to the current one.

methods.name: jump_to_next_cue()
methods.description: Jump to the next cue (marker) if possible.

methods.name: jump_to_prev_cue()
methods.description: Jump to the prior cue (marker) if possible.

methods.name: move_device()
methods.description: Move a device into the target at the given position, where 0 moves it before the first device and len(devices) moves it to the end of the device chain.If the device cannot be moved to this position, t

methods.name: play_selection()
methods.description: Start playing the current set selection, or do nothing if no selection is set.

methods.name: re_enable_automation()
methods.description: Discards overrides of automated parameters.

methods.name: redo()
methods.description: Redo the last action that was undone.

methods.name: scrub_by()
methods.description: Same as jump_by, but does not stop playback.

methods.name: set_data()
methods.description: Store data for the given key in this object. The data is persistent and will be restored when loading the Live Set.

methods.name: set_or_delete_cue()
methods.description: When a cue is selected, it gets deleted. If no cue is selected, a new cue is created at the current global songtime.

methods.name: start_playing()
methods.description: Start playing from the startmarker

methods.name: stop_all_clips()
methods.description: Stop all playing Clips (if any) but continue playing the Song.

methods.name: stop_playing()
methods.description: Stop playing the Song.

methods.name: tap_tempo()
methods.description: Trigger the tap tempo function.

methods.name: trigger_session_record()
methods.description: Triggers a new session recording.

methods.name: undo()
methods.description: Undo the last action that was made.

properties.name: appointed_device
properties.description: Read, write, and listen access to the appointed Device

properties.name: arrangement_overdub
properties.description: Get/Set the global arrangement overdub state.

properties.name: back_to_arranger
properties.description: Get/Set if triggering a Clip in the Session, disabled the playback ofClips in the Arranger.

properties.name: can_capture_midi
properties.description: Get whether there currently is material to be captured on any tracks.

properties.name: can_jump_to_next_cue
properties.description: Returns true when there is a cue marker right to the playing pos thatwe could jump to.

properties.name: can_jump_to_prev_cue
properties.description: Returns true when there is a cue marker left to the playing pos thatwe could jump to.

properties.name: can_redo
properties.description: Returns true if there is an undone action that we can redo.

properties.name: can_undo
properties.description: Returns true if there is an action that we can restore.

properties.name: canonical_parent
properties.description: Get the canonical parent of the song.

properties.name: clip_trigger_quantization
properties.description: Get/Set access to the quantization settings that are used to fireClips in the Session.

properties.name: count_in_duration
properties.description: Get the count in duration. Returns an index, mapped as follows: 0 - None, 1 - 1 Bar, 2 - 2 Bars, 3 - 4 Bars.

properties.name: cue_points
properties.description: Const access to a list of all cue points of the Live Song.

properties.name: current_song_time
properties.description: Get/Set access to the songs current playing position in ms.

properties.name: exclusive_arm
properties.description: Get if Tracks should be armed exclusively by default.

properties.name: exclusive_solo
properties.description: Get if Tracks should be soloed exclusively by default.

properties.name: groove_amount
properties.description: Get/Set the global groove amount, that adjust all setup groovesin all clips.

properties.name: groove_pool
properties.description: Get the groove pool.

properties.name: is_counting_in
properties.description: Get whether currently counting in.

properties.name: is_playing
properties.description: Returns true if the Song is currently playing.

properties.name: last_event_time
properties.description: Return the time of the last set event in the song. In contrary tosong_length, this will not add some extra beats that are mostly neededfor Display purposes in the Arrangerview.

properties.name: loop
properties.description: Get/Set the looping flag that en/disables the usage of the globalloop markers in the song.

properties.name: loop_length
properties.description: Get/Set the length of the global loop marker position in beats.

properties.name: loop_start
properties.description: Get/Set the start of the global loop marker position in beats.

properties.name: master_track
properties.description: Access to the Master Track (always available)

properties.name: metronome
properties.description: Get/Set if the metronom is audible.

properties.name: midi_recording_quantization
properties.description: Get/Set access to the settings that are used to quantizeMIDI recordings.

properties.name: nudge_down
properties.description: Get/Set the status of the nudge down button.

properties.name: nudge_up
properties.description: Get/Set the status of the nudge up button.

properties.name: overdub
properties.description: Legacy hook for Live 8 overdub state. Now hooks tosession record, but never starts playback.

properties.name: punch_in
properties.description: Get/Set the flag that will enable recording as soon as the Song playsand hits the global loop start region.

properties.name: punch_out
properties.description: Get/Set the flag that will disable recording as soon as the Song playsand hits the global loop end region.

properties.name: re_enable_automation_enabled
properties.description: Returns true if some automated parameter has been overriden

properties.name: record_mode
properties.description: Get/Set the state of the global recording flag.

properties.name: return_tracks
properties.description: Const access to the list of available Return Tracks.

properties.name: root_note
properties.description: Set and access the root note (i.e. key) of the song used for control surfaces. The root note can be a number between 0 and 11, with 0 corresponding to C and 11 corresponding to B.

properties.name: scale_intervals
properties.description: Reports the current scale’s intervals as a list of integers, starting with the root note and representing the number of halfsteps (e.g. Major → 0, 2, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11)

properties.name: scale_name
properties.description: Set and access the last used scale name for control surfaces. The default scale names that can be saved with a set and recalled are'Major', ‘Minor’, ‘Dorian’, ‘Mixolydian’ , ‘Lydian’ , ‘Phrygian’ , ‘L

properties.name: scenes
properties.description: Const access to a list of all Scenes in the Live Song.

properties.name: select_on_launch
properties.description: Get if Scenes and Clips should be selected when fired.

properties.name: session_automation_record
properties.description: Returns true if automation recording is enabled.

properties.name: session_record
properties.description: Get/Set the session record state.

properties.name: session_record_status
properties.description: Get the session slot-recording state.

properties.name: signature_denominator
properties.description: Get/Set access to the global signature denominator of the Song.

properties.name: signature_numerator
properties.description: Get/Set access to the global signature numerator of the Song.

properties.name: song_length
properties.description: Return the time of the last set event in the song, plus som extra beatsthat are usually added for better navigation in the arrangerview.

properties.name: swing_amount
properties.description: Get/Set access to the amount of swing that is applied when adding or quantizing notes to MIDI clips

properties.name: tempo
properties.description: Get/Set the global project tempo.

properties.name: tracks
properties.description: Const access to a list of all Player Tracks in the Live Song, exludingthe return and Master Track (see also Song.send_tracks and Song.master_track).At least one MIDI or Audio Track is always available

properties.name: view
properties.description: Representing the view aspects of a Live document: The Session and Arrangerview.

properties.name: visible_tracks
properties.description: Const access to a list of all visible Player Tracks in the Live Song, exludingthe return and Master Track (see also Song.send_tracks and Song.master_track).At least one MIDI or Audio Track is always a

built_ins.name: get_all_scales_ordered()
built_ins.description: Get an ordered tuple of tuples of all available scale names to intervals.

DeviceContainer.description: This class is a common super class of Track and Chain

RoutingChannel.description: This class represents a routing channel.

properties.name: display_name
properties.description: Display name of routing channel.

properties.name: layout
properties.description: The routing channel’s Layout, e.g., mono or stereo.

RoutingChannelVector.description: A container for returning routing channels from Live.

RoutingType.description: This class represents a routing type.

properties.name: attached_object
properties.description: Live object associated with the routing type.

properties.name: category
properties.description: Category of the routing type.

properties.name: display_name
properties.description: Display name of routing type.

RoutingTypeVector.description: A container for returning routing types from Live.

Track.description: This class represents a track in Live. It can be either an Audio track, a MIDI Track, a Return Track or the Master track. The Master Track and at least one Audio or MIDI track will be always present.R

methods.name: delete_clip()
methods.description: Delete the given clip. Raises a runtime error when the clip belongs to another track.

methods.name: delete_device()
methods.description: Delete a device identified by the index in the ‘devices’ list.

methods.name: duplicate_clip_slot()
methods.description: Duplicate a clip and put it into the next free slot and return the index of the destination slot. A new scene is created if no free slot is available. If creating the new scene would exceed the limita

methods.name: duplicate_clip_to_arrangement()
methods.description: Duplicate the given clip into the arrangement of this track at the provided destination time and return it. When the type of the clip and the type of the track are incompatible, a runtime error is rai

methods.name: get_data()
methods.description: Get data for the given key, that was previously stored using set_data.

methods.name: jump_in_running_session_clip()
methods.description: Jump forward or backward in the currently running Sessionclip (if any) by the specified relative amount in beats. Does nothing if no Session Clip is currently running.

methods.name: set_data()
methods.description: Store data for the given key in this object. The data is persistent and will be restored when loading the Live Set.

methods.name: stop_all_clips()
methods.description: Stop running and triggered clip and slots on this track.

properties.name: arm
properties.description: Arm the track for recording. Not available for Master- and Send Tracks.

properties.name: arrangement_clips
properties.description: const access to the list of clips in arrangement viewThe list will be empty for the master, send and group tracks.

properties.name: available_input_routing_channels
properties.description: Return a list of source channels for input routing.

properties.name: available_input_routing_types
properties.description: Return a list of source types for input routing.

properties.name: available_output_routing_channels
properties.description: Return a list of destination channels for output routing.

properties.name: available_output_routing_types
properties.description: Return a list of destination types for output routing.

properties.name: can_be_armed
properties.description: return True, if this Track has a valid arm property. Not all trackscan be armed (for example return Tracks or the Master Tracks).

properties.name: can_be_frozen
properties.description: return True, if this Track can be frozen.

properties.name: can_show_chains
properties.description: return True, if this Track contains a rack instrument device that is capable of showing its chains in session view.

properties.name: canonical_parent
properties.description: Get the canonical parent of the track.

properties.name: clip_slots
properties.description: const access to the list of clipslots (see class AClipSlot) for this track.The list will be empty for the master and sendtracks.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Get/set access to the color of the Track (RGB).

properties.name: color_index
properties.description: Get/Set access to the color index of the track. Can be None for no color.

properties.name: current_input_routing
properties.description: Get/Set the name of the current active input routing.When setting a new routing, the new routing must be one of the available ones.

properties.name: current_input_sub_routing
properties.description: Get/Set the current active input sub routing.When setting a new routing, the new routing must be one of the available ones.

properties.name: current_monitoring_state
properties.description: Get/Set the track’s current monitoring state.

properties.name: current_output_routing
properties.description: Get/Set the current active output routing.When setting a new routing, the new routing must be one of the available ones.

properties.name: current_output_sub_routing
properties.description: Get/Set the current active output sub routing.When setting a new routing, the new routing must be one of the available ones.

properties.name: devices
properties.description: Return const access to all available Devices that are present in the TracksDevicechain. This tuple will also include the ‘mixer_device’ that every Trackalways has.

properties.name: fired_slot_index
properties.description: const access to the index of the fired (and thus blinking) clipslot in this track.This index is -1 if no slot is fired and -2 if the track’s stop button has been fired.

properties.name: fold_state
properties.description: Get/Set whether the track is folded or not. Only available if is_foldable is True.

properties.name: group_track
properties.description: return the group track if is_grouped.

properties.name: has_audio_input
properties.description: return True, if this Track can be feed with an Audio signal. This istrue for all Audio Tracks.

properties.name: has_audio_output
properties.description: return True, if this Track sends out an Audio signal. This istrue for all Audio Tracks, and MIDI tracks with an Instrument.

properties.name: has_midi_input
properties.description: return True, if this Track can be feed with an Audio signal. This istrue for all MIDI Tracks.

properties.name: has_midi_output
properties.description: return True, if this Track sends out MIDI events. This istrue for all MIDI Tracks with no Instruments.

properties.name: implicit_arm
properties.description: Arm the track for recording. When The track is implicitly armed, it showsin a weaker color in the live GUI and is not saved in the set.

properties.name: input_meter_left
properties.description: Momentary value of left input channel meter, 0.0 to 1.0. For Audio Tracks only.

properties.name: input_meter_level
properties.description: Return the MIDI or Audio meter value of the Tracks input, depending on thetype of the Track input. Meter values (MIDI or Audio) are always scaledfrom 0.0 to 1.0.

properties.name: input_meter_right
properties.description: Momentary value of right input channel meter, 0.0 to 1.0. For Audio Tracks only.

properties.name: input_routing_channel
properties.description: Get and set the current source channel for input routing.Raises ValueError if the type isn’t one of the current values inavailable_input_routing_channels.

properties.name: input_routing_type
properties.description: Get and set the current source type for input routing.Raises ValueError if the type isn’t one of the current values inavailable_input_routing_types.

properties.name: input_routings
properties.description: Const access to the list of available input routings.

properties.name: input_sub_routings
properties.description: Return a list of all available input sub routings.

properties.name: is_foldable
properties.description: return True if the track can be (un)folded to hide/reveal contained tracks.

properties.name: is_frozen
properties.description: return True if this Track is currently frozen. No changes should be applied to the track’s devices or clips while it is frozen.

properties.name: is_grouped
properties.description: return True if this Track is current part of a group track.

properties.name: is_part_of_selection
properties.description: return False if the track is not selected.

properties.name: is_showing_chains
properties.description: Get/Set whether a track with a rack device is showing its chains in session view.

properties.name: is_visible
properties.description: return False if the track is hidden within a folded group track.

properties.name: mixer_device
properties.description: Return access to the special Device that every Track has: This Device containsthe Volume, Pan, Sendamounts, and Crossfade assignment parameters.

properties.name: mute
properties.description: Mute/unmute the track.

properties.name: muted_via_solo
properties.description: Returns true if the track is muted because another track is soloed.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Read/write access to the name of the Track, as visible in the track header.

properties.name: output_meter_left
properties.description: Momentary value of left output channel meter, 0.0 to 1.0.For tracks with audio output only.

properties.name: output_meter_level
properties.description: Return the MIDI or Audio meter value of the Track output (behind themixer_device), depending on the type of the Track input, this can be a MIDIor Audio meter. Meter values (MIDI or Audio) are always s

properties.name: output_meter_right
properties.description: Momentary value of right output channel meter, 0.0 to 1.0.For tracks with audio output only.

properties.name: output_routing_channel
properties.description: Get and set the current destination channel for output routing.Raises ValueError if the channel isn’t one of the current values inavailable_output_routing_channels.

properties.name: output_routing_type
properties.description: Get and set the current destination type for output routing.Raises ValueError if the type isn’t one of the current values inavailable_output_routing_types.

properties.name: output_routings
properties.description: Const access to the list of all available output routings.

properties.name: output_sub_routings
properties.description: Return a list of all available output sub routings.

properties.name: playing_slot_index
properties.description: const access to the index of the currently playing clip in the track.Will be -1 when no clip is playing.

properties.name: solo
properties.description: Get/Set the solo status of the track. Note that this will not disable thesolo state of any other track. If you want exclusive solo, you have to disable the solo state of the other Tracks manually.

properties.name: view
properties.description: Representing the view aspects of a Track.
